posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

5/16/22 - 5/22/22
Issue - V103
Current Release: 1.9.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Updates

  • Come meet the Streamlit team at Snowflake Summit!
  • Check out the new built-in Analytics Modal in Community Cloud.
  • New Streamlit Short—how to make a select box.
  • See how the Streamlit data science team uses st.session_state and query parameters to share insights through contextual apps.
  • Streamlit Community Cloud now supports Python 3.10!

Featured Content

  • BERT Semantic Interlinking Tool
  • Use Machine Learning to Find Players of Similar Profiles
  • Specklit @avratanubiswas

Tutorials/Introduction

  • How to build VennLit App for comparing lists in Python using Streamlit @dataprofessor
  • Creating Multi-Page Streamlit Apps | Python Streamlit Series Part 2 @andymcd
  • Data Science Project Under 30min Explained From Scratch: DNANucleotideCountWebApp [Python+Streamlit]
  • Streamlit YouTube Keyword Extractor Web App | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Tutorial 1
  • Streamlit YouTube Keyword Extractor Web App | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Tutorial 2
  • Using Python + Streamlit To Find Striking Distance Keyword Opportunities
  • Multiple Disease Prediction System using Machine Learning in Python | Streamlit Web App - Deployment
  • CoinMarketCap API + streamlit
  • A Full Guide to Finetuning T5 for Text2Text and Building a Demo with Streamlit
  • Streamlit -Dynamic Web Pages with Python
  • Data Visualization: How was inflation in Brazil for the past presidents?
  • Tricks Streamlit Download Button With Blank Database In CSV
  • Developing Prediction App with Streamlit
  • Utilizando Docker
  • Demo Mode: Using State in Streamlit
  • Build and deploy your first real-time dashboard with Streamlit
  • 【AWS】 FastAPI + Streamlit + DocumentDB構成で、簡易的な顧客情報入力フォームを作る(1)

Science and Tech

  • GBKviz: Genome Visualization and Comparison App @moshi4
  • Hardening Soil Model | Effect of Power m

NLP and Language

  • YouTube Web Scraper
  • Lazy Film Reviews
  • Fake News Classification & Prediction - Streamlit Web App

Data Visualization

  • Advanced distribution plots
  • Electricity Dashboard
  • Water Usage Dashboard
  • 608 final project in streamlit

CV and Images

  • AI Face Generator @gituhin
  • Convert images to a colormap @Kevin_Arvai

Sports

  • IPL Dashboard
  • Olympics Analysis

Finance and Business

  • CLTV Tahmini ve Müşteri Segmentasyonu
  • Weighted Average Cost of Capital
  • Impacto da importação/exportação dos Estados Unidos no câmbio
  • Stock Volatility Clustering & Prediction
  • Stock Trend Prediction App
  • Housing Price Prediction
  • Lean or bloated organization?

Geography and Society

  • Winter climate analysis in Almaty, KZ with Streamlit @yevkad
  • Plataforma de Dados Geoespaciais Abertos para os Objetivos de Desenvolvimento Sustentável
  • Covid-19 Dashboard for India
  • The webapp to entertain prediction and graphical exploration using Streamlit - phase I

General

  • Python Code Writing Bot @Eileen
  • PyBoys AutoScout Model App
  • Movie Recommnder System
  • Lista de Quem Traz Paes
  • Extract word and table from PDF files @BeyondMyself
  • Speckle2Notion
  • User Authentication for Your Streamlit App – DEMO

Model building and training

  • Train few shot classification models in browser

Cool happenings and other things

  • Simple requirements statements checker using spaCy @asehmi
  • Cómo crear aplicaciones visuales para interactuar con tus datos Upcoming meetup 5/31
  • Crie aplicações facilmente utilizando o Streamlit Upcoming talk 6/2/22
  • Women in Data Science (WiDS) Recife 2022 Upcomingn event 6/4/22

Follow us

  • Twitter
